thread.title: Royal Mail man sends message at Santander
thread.title_full: Royal Mail man sends message at Santander

title: Royal Mail man sends message at Santander
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now Royal Mail man sends message at Santander The move to Santander will mark a return to banking for Shane O’Riordain Toby Melville/Reuters Patrick Hosking Financial Editor Published at 12:01AM, August 15 2015 
The communications chief at Royal Mail is heading to Santander UK in a move that will intensify speculation that the Spanish-owned bank is close to a London flotation. 
Shane O’Riordain, who played a key role in the Royal Mail flotation, is joining the bank in January as head of communications and corporate affairs. The move will mark a return to banking for Mr O’Riordain, who ran communications at HBOS for many years until its collapse in 2008. He transferred to Lloyds, but left in 2010. 
Santander UK has been considering a flotation for many years. Because of its well-known brand, Subscribe now
